meanings.definition: The act of protruding or bulging out
meanings.sent1: The herniations in the wall of the balloon made it look lumpy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the herniations in the tire were causing the air to leak out.
meanings.sent3: The herniations in the cake frosting gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The herniations in the fabric created a bumpy surface.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the herniations in the soft pillow as I rested my head.

meanings.definition: An abnormal protrusion of an organ or tissue through a weak spot in the surrounding muscle or connective tissue
meanings.sent1: The herniations in the wall of the balloon made it look lumpy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the herniations in the tire were causing the air to leak out.
meanings.sent3: The herniations in the cake frosting gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent4: The herniations in the fabric created a bumpy surface.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the herniations in the soft pillow as I rested my head.
